title: Tardy information - determine knowledge from data

content.question: Which of the following information cannot be determined using only the information in the data set?

choices.label: The district-wide total number of students who were late to school at least 10 times
The district-wide total number of students who were late to school between 1 and 9 times, inclusive
The district-wide percentage of students who voted for a later school start time
The district-wide percentage of the students who were late at least 1 time who submitted medical excuse documentation for at least 1 late arrival

content.answer: The district-wide percentage of students who voted for a later school start time

topic.text: 4.1: Ethical and Social Issues Around Data Collection

skill.text: 1.B: Determine what knowledge can be extracted from data.
